Name: Slow Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall
Ingredients: 15 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. FLOAT sloe gin on surface so it bleeds into drink. Finish with Galliano FLOAT.
Review: Peach schnapps is borrowed from the Fuzzy Navel to influence this member of the Slow Comfortable family , its presence gives this cocktail a distinctive sweet peachy note.
Nutrition: One serving of Slow Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall contains 306 calories
